name: Katastrophe
description:
This is my game for Ludum Dare 46 : Keep it Alive. 

It is a platformer with a CAT!! Escort the cat to safety and use what you can to keep it alive.

I have had a really good time making this. It is also the first project I have collaborated  and am really happy how it has came out.

My friend Ben Sidwell made the music for this game, which is amazing!!

p.s you can wall jump

@yeti_kid

If you have downloaded the windows version the game is located in the "win64" folder and named "LD46.exe"
